MODAL.SERVER_CRASH_MESSAGE:
Are you sure you want to reset all respawns due to the server crash?
- Boss respawns will be rolled back by 5 minutes
- Elite respawns will be rolled back by 18 seconds
MODAL.LOGOUT_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to log out?

MODAL.OTP_TIMER: The code has been sent to your email and is valid for {{seconds}} seconds.

REGISTER.EXCLUDE_BOSSES_DESCRIPTION: Selected bosses will not appear in the general timer list. However, you can always add them later if you change your mind.
REGISTER.EXCLUDE_ELITES_DESCRIPTION: Selected elites will not appear in the general timer list. However, you can always add them later if you change your mind.

MODAL.OTP_TIMER: The code has been sent to your email and is valid for {{seconds}} seconds.

LOG.SERVER_CRASH: all bosses/elites due to server crash

USER.EXCLUDE_BOSSES_DESCRIPTION: Selected bosses will not appear in the general timer list. However, you can always add them later if you change your mind.
USER.EXCLUDE_ELITES_DESCRIPTION: Selected elites will not appear in the general timer list. However, you can always add them later if you change your mind.

ADMIN.UPDATE_ROLE_DESCRIPTION: Update role for the selected user.
ADMIN.UNAVAILABLE_BOSSES_DESCRIPTION: Select bosses to exclude for the selected user.
ADMIN.UNAVAILABLE_ELITES_DESCRIPTION: Select elites to exclude for the selected user.

MESSAGE.USER_ROLE_UPDATED: User role for {{nickname}} has been successfully updated
MESSAGE.USER_ACCESS_SETTINGS_UPDATED: Accessibility settings for user {{nickname}} have been successfully updated

MODAL.USER_DELETION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete user {{nickname}}?

VALIDATIONS.EMAIL_OR_NICKNAME_REQUIRED: • Please enter your email or username!
VALIDATIONS.PASSWORD_MISS_NUMBER: • Password must contain at least one number!
VALIDATIONS.PASSWORD_MISS_UPPER_LATIN: • Password must contain at least one uppercase Latin letter!
VALIDATIONS.PASSWORD_MISS_LOWER_LATIN: • Password must contain at least one lowercase Latin letter!
VALIDATIONS.NICKNAME_MAX_UPPER: • Nickname can contain no more than 2 uppercase letters!
VALIDATIONS.NICKNAME_NO_SPECIAL_CHARS: • Nickname must not contain special characters!
VALIDATIONS.NICKNAME_NO_HYPHEN_START_END: • Nickname must not start or end with a hyphen!
VALIDATIONS.NICKNAME_MAX_ONE_HYPHEN: • Nickname can contain no more than one hyphen!
VALIDATIONS.NICKNAME_NO_MIXED_SCRIPTS: • Nickname cannot mix Cyrillic and Latin characters!
